title: Wine Searcher Region Rankings & Prices - SuperScraper Input
description: Configure the scraper to extract wine data from Wine-Searcher region pages. Set a starting region, choose sorting, and control sub-region depth.

startUrl.title: Start Region URL
startUrl.description: The Wine-Searcher region URL to start scraping from. Examples: https://www.wine-searcher.com/regions-burgundy, https://www.wine-searcher.com/regions-italy, https://www.wine-searcher.com/regions-napa+valley
startUrl.sectionDescription: Choose the Wine-Searcher region to scrape

scrapeSubRegions.title: Scrape Sub-Regions
scrapeSubRegions.description: If enabled, the scraper will recursively discover and scrape all sub-regions within the selected region. For example, starting from Italy will also scrape Tuscany, Piedmont, Barolo, etc.

maxDepth.title: Maximum Depth
maxDepth.description: How deep to go into sub-regions. 0 = only the start region, 1 = start + direct sub-regions, 2 = two levels deep, etc. Countries like Italy or France can have 5+ levels.
maxDepth.sectionDescription: Control pagination, sorting, and crawl depth

maxPagesPerRegion.title: Max Pages per Region
maxPagesPerRegion.description: Maximum number of pagination pages to scrape per region. Each page contains ~25 wines. Set to 1 for a quick overview, or 20 for up to 500 wines per region.

tabFilter.title: Wine Sorting
tabFilter.description: Choose how wines are sorted on each region page.

requestTimeout.title: Request Timeout (seconds)
requestTimeout.description: Timeout for each HTTP request in seconds. Increase if you experience timeouts on slow pages.
